question: When looking for a wife, in which mannerism are allowed to look. is it permissible to look at her?
answer:
QUESTION
I am talking of the situation when on goes to seea girl for the first time.(When intending to marry ) it is everymans desire taht he gets a nice wife, both spiritually and physically. I know its not allowed to look at women, but how is a man to know the physic of the women(it is difficult to tell wen they are in hijab) In this case, is it permissible to look at her?
ANSWER


Share:
It is permissible to look at a girl?s face with the intention of marrying her.

It is obvious for the girl to remove her veil if arrangements has been made for a boy to see a girl as a prospective marriage partner.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
